OOC: Let's look at what Cardhead said. "I'll stop when they do." Well, Card=
head is the asshole who started it, isn't he? What a hypocrite...

  ----- =
Original Message ----- 
  From: cardhead649 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
=
  Sent: Monday, August 05, 2002 7:48 AM
  Subject: Re: ooC: people...


  I=
'll stop when they do.  But Rauq, even you have to admit that HNC's 
  inau=
gural rp post wasn't worth the time it took to read the first 
  line, let =
alone the whole thing.  And Lurker's start-up is the most 
  over-dramatize=
d entrance I've ever seen - all you need is a shot of 
  Dr. Frankenstein t=
hrowing a switch and it's a ripoff of every single 
  horror movie out ther=
e.  

  It's improved somewhat since then.

  As far as characters are conc=
erned, Terminion and 
  Skullertron/Slaughter actually display both persona=
lity and 
  potential.  The remaining four have been cannon-fodder thus far=
.

  That's my opinion and it's up to you guys to prove me right or wrong 
=
  by roleplaying, not bitching.  And this is a serious RPG, not a 
  slapst=
ick movie, so if I see another post/exchange like HNC's first 
  one, where=
 everyone involved is an absolute idiot, I will ingore 
  every post therea=
fter made by the perpetrator(s) regardless of who 
  they are or think they=
 are.

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  > I've bee=
n lurking around for those wondering. Megatron is waiting 
  in 
  > the co=
ntrol room for the Predacons, most of which are 'busy' or 
  > something. I=
 really don't have much to post about right now, but I 
  > still have to r=
ead the posts up till when i last checked em.
  > 
  > I guess i have to st=
ick my nose in, cause this obviously aint 
  > getting better, it's getting=
 worse. *raises verbal shields*
  > 
  > First think that needs to happen i=
s a cease fire in this flame war 
  > between cardhead, lurker, and narrato=
r. it started wrong right from 
  > the start. certain things which shouldn=
't have been said, were 
  said, 
  > and the replies were less than sucess=
ful at defusing the situation 
  > and it blew up. 
  > 
  > cardhead, if y=
ou don't like Narrator's posting style, that's your 
  > problem. Telling h=
im that you don't like it, with a bunch of 
  > senseless slander isn't goi=
ng to make him post the way you'd like 
  > him to post.
  > 
  > Narrator,=
 keep ooc comments out of your posting, if you want to say 
  > something, =
say it and no pot shots. And I find it really hard to 
  > believe that you=
 managed to put 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up' 
  in 
  > the same conte=
xt.
  > 
  > If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up about thi=
s 
  > stupid arguement, and get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can 
=
  > say now short of an appologies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me 
  > =
that anyone is growing up.
  > 
  > *preps for backlash*


   

  Your use =
of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
